mapper.select: SELECT house_number as name, id from t_house where building_id=#{buildingId} and community_id=#{communityId}
SELECT building_name as name,id,community_id from t_building where community_id=#{id}

SELECT CONCAT(b.community_name,b.building_name,b.units,'单元',b.house_number) as name ,a.house_id FROM t_owner a,t_house b where a.user_id=#{userId} and a.identity=0 and a.state=1 and a.deleted=0 and a.house_id=b.id
SELECT COALESCE((SELECT '已注册' FROM t_user WHERE phone = #{phone}), '未注册') AS isRegister
SELECT id,real_name,phone,identity from t_owner where house_id=#{houseId} and state=1 and identity!=0 and deleted=0
mapper.update: update t_owner set deleted=1 , update_time=now() where id=#{id} and owner_id in(SELECT id from(select id from t_owner where user_id=#{userId} and identity=0 and state=1 and deleted=0)a )
